pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Honey Comb, 1 Honey Comb Block, 1 Pea, 1 Sproutling, 1 Empty Premium Packet, 325 Sun value.

pages.title: Snipers
pages.text: $(#25228d)Beeshooters shut down flying zombies and zombies with headwear by poisoning them.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Poisons Zombies. Prioritizes flying zombies, then the strongest Zombie with headwear.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)Beeshooter shoots bees butt-first. It may seem a little weird, but thatâ€™s okay. They have a system and it works for them.
